kpi.name: M1023C0

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR SIGNALLING RB DCH UL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in signaling radio bearer in uplink direction during measurement interval. The counter is updated at 20 second intervals or when the connection is released or when active set is changed.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR SIGNALLING RB DCH UL
